title: Thlemnaah lut suh la luh chu sual a ni
lyrics:
Thlemnaah lut suh la, luh chu sual a ni,
I hnehnin thlemna dang i hneh thei zel ang;
Huai takin bei zel la, chakna sual hnehin,
Isua lam en fo la, a hruai zel fo vang che.

Tanpui, Chhandamtu dil la,
Thlamuan, tichak leh vawnga'n,
Aman a pui duh a che,
A hruai zel fo vang che.

Thian sual hawisan la, tawngkam tha lo n en,
Pathian hming chu zah la, sawi nawmnah lovin;
Ngilnei thahnemngai leh thinlung dik takin,
Isua lam en fo la, a hruai zel fo vang che.

A hnehtu apiangte lallukhum a pe,
Rin vangin kan hneh ang, chauh chang awm mah se;
Kan Chhandamtu chuan hneh turin min pui ang,
Isua lam en fo la, a hruai zel fo vang che.
